skdetail:

Invocation Name: math flashcards
des: Alexa can help you practice adding and subtracting with the 10 more and 10 less skill. Students should already be familiar with place value, addition and subtraction and the idea of adding 10 more or subtracting 10 less.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
